predicate.note: Frames file for 'crunch' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: without endstate
example.text: At this point , the options were : [*] Crunch money [*-1] to stop the boost in the aggregates , as Sir Alan surely advised [*?*] , and [*] forget the soaring pound .
example.arg: [*-1] to stop the boost in the aggregates

example.name: with endstate
example.text: At 10:33 , when the S&P 500 December futures contract crunched to a 12-point loss under the force of sell programs [*T*-4] , S&P futures trading was halted [*-1] and program trades on the Big Board were routed [*-2] into a special computer that [*T*-3] scans for order imbalances .
example.arg: under the force of sell programs
